name: Badger DAO
introduce: BadgerDAO is focused on building the products and infrastructure necessary to accelerate the growth of Bitcoin in Decentralized Finance (DeFi) across multiple blockchains. Badger’s first product, Sett Vaults, allows users to earn yield on their synthetic BTC assets. Digg, Badger’s second product, is software that manages the DIGG token, an elastic-supply cryptocurrency pegged to the dollar price of bitcoin.
